channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Giant Hogweed, 2nd October
item.description:
Young lad playing in the King George 5th playing field yesterday has come into contact with Giant Hogweed. He has come out in very large blisters which has been confirmed by the chemist in Askwith Road. Can someone take a look to see if there is any plants there.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hadrians Way, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 2nd October
item.description:
ENWD 2 X DISLODGED COVERS PLEASE MAKE SAFE STANDARD TM Section 81 has been raised to openreach (Damaged Street Furniture)

item.title: No road markings to prevent blocking driveway, 2nd October
item.description:
No. 18 has a driveway on this road across the whole house but no dropped kerb. Some people unintentionally park on the road in front blocking the cars on the driveway. It will be good to have white lines on the road covering the whole driveway so people know not to park here.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, The Close, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
